session_title: KEYNOTE: Unlocking the Infinite: How OmniVerse Technologies is Architecting the Post-Human Intelligence Era
abstract: We stand at the precipice of a new dawn. AI is no longer just a tool; it is an omnipresent partner in the human experience. In this opening keynote, join OmniVerse Technologies as we unveil our 'Universal Cognition Engine.' Discover how we are seamlessly integrating hyper-scale compute with neuro-symbolic reasoning to empower enterprises to transcend traditional limitations. Witness the revolution. Experience the synergy. The future is Omni.

session_title: KEYNOTE: The Generative Frontier: Bridging Imagination and Reality at Scale
abstract: Generative AI has captured our collective imagination, but how do we bridge the gap between cool demos and enterprise ROI? QuantumBridge AI presents a roadmap for operationalizing creativity. We will explore case studies of Fortune 500 companies leveraging our 'QuantumLeap' platform to automate complex workflows, generate production-ready assets, and redefine customer engagement. It’s time to stop experimenting and start scaling with confidence.

session_title: KEYNOTE: Beyond the Hype: A Sober Look at AGI Timelines and Safety Hurdles
speaker_role: Director of the Center for Safe Intelligence
abstract: While industry races toward larger models, critical questions remain regarding robustness, alignment, and true generalization. This talk will move beyond marketing timelines to examine the rigorous engineering and theoretical breakthroughs actually required to reach Artificial General Intelligence. We will discuss novel approaches to constitutional AI and the mathematical boundaries of current transformer architectures.

session_title: Revolutionizing RAG: 10x Your Retrieval Speeds with VectorShift's Hyper-Indexing
abstract: Is your RAG pipeline sluggish? Are your LLMs hallucinating due to poor context? Stop settling for legacy vector databases. Join VectorShift as we demonstrate our proprietary 'Hyper-Index' technology. Learn how our end-to-end platform guarantees sub-millisecond latency even at petabyte scale, empowering your team to build real-time, hallucination-free agents effortlessly. See why industry leaders are shifting to VectorShift.

session_title: Democratizing Intelligence: Building Complex Agents with ZERO Code using CogniFlow
abstract: The agentic future shouldn't be reserved for those with PhDs in machine learning. In this session, we will live-build a complex, multi-modal customer service agent using CogniFlow’s intuitive drag-and-drop interface. We’ll show you how to connect disparate data sources, implement guardrails, and deploy to production in under 60 minutes. Empower your business analysts to become AI engineers today with CogniFlow.

session_title: Infrastructure for the Trillion-Parameter Era: Lessons from HyperCompute Nexus
abstract: Training foundation models requires more than just GPUs; it requires a fundamentally new approach to data center orchestration. HyperCompute Nexus shares insights from our latest deployments, supporting models exceeding 1T parameters. We will discuss overcoming networking bottlenecks, optimizing energy efficiency, and how our 'Nexus Fabric' provides the only turnkey solution for supercomputing-scale AI.

session_title: Optimizing Edge Inference: Squeezing LLMs onto Commodity Hardware
abstract: Deploying powerful AI shouldn't mean relying solely on the cloud. NeuroNet introduces our latest quantization breakthroughs that allow 70B parameter models to run efficiently on standard edge devices without significant accuracy loss. Join us for a technical deep dive into our 'NeuroShrink' SDK and learn how to bring intelligence to the absolute edge of your network.

session_title: The Data Bottleneck is Dead: Generating Infinite High-Fidelity Training Data with SynthMind
abstract: Real-world data is messy, biased, and expensive. Synthetic data is the future. SynthMind’s platform allows you to generate perfectly labeled, diverse, and privacy-compliant datasets on demand. Stop waiting for data collection and start training tomorrow's models today. We will showcase customer success stories in autonomous driving and healthcare where SynthMind reduced time-to-market by 40%.

session_title: GPTify Your Enterprise: 5 Steps to Secure, Internal LLM Adoption
abstract: Your employees are already using ChatGPT. Are you securing that data? GPTify provides the fastest route to a secure, compliant, and customized internal LLM gateway. In this rapid-fire session, we’ll show you how to integrate your SSO, apply corporate governance policies, and launch your own branded internal AI assistant in less than a week. Don't get left behind—get GPTified.

session_title: Novel Loss Functions for Sparse Mixture-of-Experts Models in Low-Resource Settings
abstract: Mixture-of-Experts (MoE) architectures offer computational efficiency but often suffer from training instability in low-resource environments. We propose a novel auxiliary loss function that balances expert load more effectively than current state-of-the-art baselines. We present empirical results across multiple benchmarks demonstrating a 15% improvement in convergence speed and superior downstream task performance on diverse languages.

session_title: Federated Learning Benchmarks: A Comparative Analysis of Aggregation Strategies under Non-IID Data Distributions
abstract: As privacy concerns grow, Federated Learning (FL) is gaining traction. However, standard benchmarks often assume Independent and Identically Distributed (IID) data, which rarely reflects real-world scenarios. This talk presents a rigorous comparative analysis of aggregation strategies (FedAvg, FedProx, SCAFFOLD) under severe non-IID conditions, offering new guidelines for robust FL deployment.

session_title: Detecting and Mitigating Subtle Hallucinations in Multi-Modal Agentic Workflows
abstract: When agents interact with both text and images, hallucination modes become complex and interdependent. Our research uncovers how visual inputs can sometimes override textual ground truth in current VLM architectures. We introduce a new evaluation framework, 'GroundTruth-MM', for systematically stress-testing multi-modal agents against subtle, dangerous fabrication errors.

session_title: Efficient Fine-Tuning on Consumer Hardware: Pushing the Limits of LoRA and QLoRA
abstract: Can we effectively fine-tune 13B parameter models on a single 24GB GPU? This session explores extreme quantization techniques combined with Low-Rank Adaptation (LoRA). We will share our open-source scripts and methodology for achieving near-full precision performance while dramatically reducing VRAM requirements, democratizing access to custom model creation for academic researchers.

session_title: Real-World Lessons: Deploying GenAI in a Highly Regulated Financial Institution
abstract: Hype meets reality when you need to deploy LLMs in banking. We will share our brutal, honest journey of integrating generative AI into our fraud detection and customer service workflows. No sales pitch here—just hard-learned lessons about compliance, unexpected failure modes, cost overruns, and the actual, measurable ROI we eventually achieved.

session_title: PANEL: The Future of MLOps - Converging Toolchains or Persistent Fragmentation?
abstract: With thousands of MLOps tools on the market, engineers are drowning in integration debt. Will we see a grand consolidation, or is fragmentation the new normal? Join our diverse panel of startup founders, enterprise architects, and open-source maintainers as we debate the future of the AI stack. Expect spicy takes and no easy answers.

session_title: Navigating the Vector Database Landscape: An Independent Consultant's View
abstract: Pinecone, Weaviate, Milvus, Chroma, pgvector—the list goes on. Which one is actually right for your use case? As an independent architect who has implemented half a dozen of these for various clients, I will provide an unbiased breakdown of the pros, cons, hidden costs, and scaling realities of the major players in the vector database space.
